text: "Just as Long as You Are There" is a 1993 song by French singer-songwriter Vanessa Paradis and is the third single from her third studio album Vanessa Paradis. It went to number 57 in the United Kingdom. It was produced by Lenny Kravitz. == Track listing == ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:Vanessa Paradis songs
title: Just as Long as You Are There
